# state

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates whether a view has a visual effect applied.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var state: NSVisualEffectView.State { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSVisualEffectView/State-swift.enum/followsWindowActiveState].

## Enabling or Disabling the Effect

- **NSVisualEffectView.State**: Constants to specify how the material appearance should reflect window activity state.
